name: LINKUP__SEARCH
description: Performs AI-powered web search to retrieve contextual information with sources for grounding LLM responses. Optimized for precision with configurable depth and output formats.

q.description: The natural language question for which you want to retrieve context

depth.description: Defines the precision of the search. 'standard' returns results faster; 'deep' takes longer but yields more comprehensive results

outputType.description: The type of output format. 'sourcedAnswer' provides an answer with sources, 'searchResults' returns raw search results, 'structured' allows custom formatting

structuredOutputSchema.description: JSON schema (as string) for structured output format. Required only when outputType is 'structured'. Root must be of type object

includeImages.description: Whether to include images in search results

fromDate.description: Start date for search results in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

toDate.description: End date for search results in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD)

excludeDomains.description: List of domain URLs to exclude from search results (e.g., ['wikipedia.com', 'pinterest.com'])

includeDomains.description: List of domain URLs to specifically include in search results (e.g., ['microsoft.com', 'github.com'])

name: LINKUP__GET_CREDITS_BALANCE
description: Retrieves the current credit balance for the Linkup account. Credits are consumed when making search requests.
